{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3084395,"name":"rklopp","username":"rklopp","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rklopp/{size}/9266_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-25T23:35:34.532Z","cooked":"

‚Ä¶and does not cost an arm and a leg? We (Team 100) is shopping and I am not real keen on spending thousands on a router with a DIY control. I‚Äôd consider Centroid, ProtoTrak, Fagor, and up. I realize Mitsubishi, Siemens, Heidenhain, and Fanuc may be out of reach.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-25T23:35:34.532Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":365,"reads":444,"readers_count":443,"score":1913.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"rklopp","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28896,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3084398,"name":"Aidan Mundy","username":"Aidan-Mundy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/aidan-mundy/{size}/177044_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-25T23:38:38.494Z","cooked":"

The omio.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-25T23:38:38.494Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":444,"readers_count":443,"score":178.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Aidan Mundy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":30018,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5113A, 87A"},"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/2","custom_user_title":"5113A, 87A","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084399,"name":"Anand Rajamani","username":"asid61","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/asid61/{size}/7179_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-25T23:38:59.689Z","cooked":"

I have a Langmuir MR-1 on order and they have their own control system (or at least an interface), which is nice.

May I ask why you want something nicer than a WCP Omio with Mach3 and their custom skin? If you‚Äôre looking for a 4x4 maybe Shop Sabre has something nicer for control?

Aidan-Mundy:

The omio.

I assumed they are looking for something better than stock Mach3 that ships with an Omio.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-25T23:39:33.473Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":440,"readers_count":439,"score":108.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Anand Rajamani","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":21715,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084400,"name":"Brendan Simons, 5406","username":"nuclearnerd","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nuclearnerd/{size}/7324_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-25T23:42:07.016Z","cooked":"

Our router actually runs on an Acorn controller that runs Centroid.
https://www.centroidcnc.com/centroid_diy/acorn_cnc_controller.html

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-25T23:42:07.016Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":400,"readers_count":399,"score":110.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Brendan Simons, 5406","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.centroidcnc.com/centroid_diy/acorn_cnc_controller.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Acorn CNC controller, Step and Direction 4 axis CNC Control board with ethernet communication.DIY CNC kit","clicks":48}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":22221,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084401,"name":"Aidan Mundy","username":"Aidan-Mundy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/aidan-mundy/{size}/177044_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-25T23:45:32.656Z","cooked":"

The stock Mach3 that ships with the Omio does its job. It‚Äôs been a hot minute since I‚Äôve used it, but I don‚Äôt remember fighting with it much.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-26T00:00:37.461Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":378,"readers_count":377,"score":120.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Aidan Mundy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":21715,"username":"asid61","name":"Anand Rajamani","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/asid61/{size}/7179_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":30018,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5113A, 87A"},"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/5","custom_user_title":"5113A, 87A","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084404,"name":"rklopp","username":"rklopp","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rklopp/{size}/9266_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-26T00:01:57.892Z","cooked":"

We have a CNC lathe with Mach3 and it is godawful. I am trying to avoid buying a project for thousands. I admit to being spoiled by real CNC controls in my professional life.

Was the Centroid Acorn a retrofit to an existing router?

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-26T00:01:57.892Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":370,"readers_count":369,"score":89.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"rklopp","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28896,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084407,"name":"Anand Rajamani","username":"asid61","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/asid61/{size}/7179_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-26T00:09:53.880Z","cooked":"

I will say that using an Omio is pretty painless compared to a custom Mach3 install. Omio or WCP will provide you with all the files and configs you need to set it up.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-26T00:09:53.880Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":350,"readers_count":349,"score":90.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Anand Rajamani","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":28896,"username":"rklopp","name":"rklopp","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rklopp/{size}/9266_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":21715,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084408,"name":"Cory","username":"Cory","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cory/{size}/312_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-26T00:15:05.768Z","cooked":"

Shopsabre uses WinCNC.

I wouldn‚Äôt call it a real controller (it‚Äôs still pc based with a keyboard and mouse interface), but you don‚Äôt need a ‚Äúreal‚Äù controller for router work.

It‚Äôs not a project though. You turn it on for the first time and it works. It‚Äôs a little cheap looking and not as full functioned as a fanuc/haas/mazatrol/siemens/heidenhein/etc, but you don‚Äôt really actually use it to do anything. The work flow is so simple compared to a real cnc mill that it‚Äôs just fine.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-26T00:15:05.768Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":338,"readers_count":337,"score":177.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Cory","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":21715,"username":"asid61","name":"Anand Rajamani","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/asid61/{size}/7179_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":true,"admin":false,"staff":true,"user_id":1037,"hidden":false,"trust_level":4,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084409,"name":"sanddrag","username":"sanddrag","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/c68b51/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-09-26T00:16:52.679Z","cooked":"

Tormach 24r router runs their PathPilot control interface, which is Tormach‚Äôs own customization/fork of LinuxCNC which is pretty nice.

The Langmuir MR-1 is also an interesting affordable option. It has their own software interface that is pretty nice, and there‚Äôs plenty of favorable attributes of the machine.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-26T00:23:33.899Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":19,"reads":317,"readers_count":316,"score":203.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"sanddrag","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":1082,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084419,"name":"paulonis","username":"paulonis","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/5fc32e/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-09-26T00:54:09.962Z","cooked":"

CAMaster routers also use WinCNC. It‚Äôs in a different class than Mach3 as it uses dedicated hardware in the PC to generate the pulse train rather than using the PC CPU.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-26T00:54:09.962Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":294,"readers_count":293,"score":108.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"paulonis","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":22261,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/10","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"100","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3084442,"name":"Anshul Bajaj","username":"anshul","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/anshul/{size}/156934_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-26T02:40:41.110Z","cooked":"

I will second ShopSabe. All of 4414‚Äôs polycarbonate parts were cut on my RC 4x8 (with spindle and table upgrades). Their controller is definitely the best I‚Äôve used on any router. I am not sure what your budget is, but their ‚Äú23‚Äù is a pretty good budget option, or you can step up to the RC series for a few more features (better spindle, vacuum table, etc) and a larger table. They have even better models with ball screws and tool changers, but those go for $50k+

Happy to answer any questions about the machine.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-26T02:40:41.110Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":269,"readers_count":268,"score":143.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Anshul Bajaj","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":1037,"username":"Cory","name":"Cory","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cory/{size}/312_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":42424,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":" 4414 | Design, MFG, & Strategy Mentor ü§ôüèæ"},"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/11","custom_user_title":" 4414 | Design, MFG, & Strategy Mentor ü§ôüèæ","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3085555,"name":"","username":"Bobbydodo","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/65b543/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-09-29T16:14:00.331Z","cooked":"

I think https://lagunatools.com/cnc makes a good CNC router with a decent control system

We run production on a Shop Sabre router, and I am looking to add more to the shop at AndyMark. They are pretty solid machines, and have great customer support!

Does the ShopSabre take standard (EIA) g-code?

","post_number":15,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-29T19:50:55.133Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":154,"readers_count":153,"score":50.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"rklopp","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28896,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/15","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3085661,"name":"Kevin LaPerriere","username":"kl26436","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/k/ea5d25/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-09-29T19:55:00.443Z","cooked":"

Ours isn‚Äôt bad ‚Äì they just have an unfortunate feature on their B&R controller where in a machine settings screen if a kid hits ‚ÄúImport settings‚Äù and there‚Äôs no USB or settings to import it wipes out everything and requires you to painstakingly have to redefine every auto tool changer position, interpret somewhat vague instructions for what the settings actually mean, and have a mild heart attack when you realize you need to manually recalibrate the stepper motors‚Ä¶

But they also sell machines with FANUC controllers now.

","post_number":16,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-29T19:56:05.973Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":14,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":153,"readers_count":152,"score":55.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Kevin LaPerriere","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":1082,"username":"sanddrag","name":"sanddrag","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/c68b51/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":37084,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/16","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3085662,"name":"Cory","username":"Cory","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cory/{size}/312_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-29T19:56:06.796Z","cooked":"

You can see what they use here. It‚Äôs got all the stuff you‚Äôd be using on a regular basis. Not sure if it‚Äôs got every g code other controls have.

You won‚Äôt be able to just take your code from say a Haas or some other industry standard VMC and run it on WinCNC, but you can get posts for legitimate CAM software (I know MasterCAM has one), otherwise ShopSabre ships with vCarve and a shopsabre post.

I was responding to the Laguna post. ‚ÄúOurs‚Äù has the B&R controller that Laguna modified. Their new generation of machines have fanuc but they cost a pretty penny.

","post_number":19,"post_type":1,"posts_count":22,"updated_at":"2022-09-29T23:19:43.571Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":108,"readers_count":107,"score":46.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":415441,"topic_slug":"does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control","display_username":"Kevin LaPerriere","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":37084,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/does-anybody-make-a-cnc-router-with-a-real-control/415441/19","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3085758,"name":"scottandme","username":"scottandme","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/scottandme/{size}/112026_2.png","created_at":"2022-09-30T01:47:19.726Z","cooked":"

DMS has a lower cost (Freedom CNC) line that has ballscrews and a Fagor control, but still starting in the low 40‚Äôs. https://dmscncrouters.com/product-lines/freedom/

DMS/Freedom weren‚Äôt especially communicative pre-sales, and we ended up going with ShopSabre. No complaints there.
